titleStmt.title: The Scotch lasses constancy, or Jenny's lamentation for the death of Jockey who for her sake was unfortunately kill'd by Sawny in a duel, being a most pleasant new song, to a new tune.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey. cf. BM.
